long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bilingual keyboards cause an annoying human error: you type a letter or two (e.g. ‘f’ for Facebook) quickly followed by ‘enter’, only to discover that you are in the wrong language 😣

With this simple extension you can stop accidentally searching for foreign letters!

For example, you can easily tell the extension that when you type غخع
or ㅛㅐㅕ
or んらな
or טםו
or 卜人山
or बदह
or нщг
or υοθ
or եոը
etc.
What you really mean is to navigate to youtube.com!
